message: My body is frozen... my voice is silent... and... and...
My right arm quivers. Or at least, my upper arm does.
The rest of my arm is missing, bitten off clean below the elbow.
It doesn't hurt, but its absence still terrifies me.
The idea of losing it forever... terrifies me.
Something bites it off at the knee.
Darkness, thick and viscous, licks at the stump.
I have to get out of here. Quickly. Before it's too late.
